headline: 2 Stocks Crushing It With Share Buybacks
summary: Share buybacks are an alternative to dividends for returning value to shareholders.  AutoZone (NYSE: AZO) and General Motors (NYSE: GM) are two companies that have absolutely crushed it with share buybacks.  Unless you're familiar with AutoZone as a company and a stock, it might seem a little backward to you.
